      • getIDOfFolderWithName

        @Nullable
public java.lang.String getIDOfFolderWithName(@NonNull
                                                         java.lang.String name,
                                                         @Nullable
                                                         java.lang.String inFolder,
                                                         boolean shouldCreateIfNotFound)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                                         MultipleFoldersFoundException
        Searches for the folder saved in google drive with the given name and returns it's id
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the folder saved in google drive
        inFolder - The id of the folder containing the given folder
        shouldCreateIfNotFound - If the given folder is not found then this parameter decides whether to create a new folder with the given name or not
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        MultipleFoldersFoundException

      • uploadFileToDrive

                                          java.io.File toUpload)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Upload a file to google drive
        Parameters:
        mediaName - The name of the uploaded file
        destinationFolderID - Id of the folder into which the file has to be uploaded
        toUpload - The file which is to be uploaded
        Returns:
        id of the file if uploaded successfully
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getFilesFromDrive

        public java.util.List<com.google.api.services.drive.model.File> getFilesFromDrive(@Nullable
                                                                                  java.lang.String folderName,
                                                                                  @Nullable
                                                                                  java.lang.String parentId)
                                                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Fetches the list of files from google drive for a given folder.
        Parameters:
        folderName - (optional) The name of folder whose files are to be fetched If folderName is null then all files are fetched from the drive
        parentId - (optional) The id of the parent folder containing the given folder
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
